gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.content: If you are a legal practitioner, complete your profile and add your specializations so clients can find you. Ensure your qualifications and licenses are up to date.

bookingConsultations.title: Booking & Consultations
bookingConsultations.content: Clients can book consultations through your profile. Ensure your availability is accurate. Payments are processed securely; consult our support for disputes.

legalGuidance.title: Legal guidance
legalGuidance.content: We provide a platform to connect clients with licensed practitioners. Our content is for informational purposes and not a substitute for professional legal advice. Always confirm advice with a qualified attorney in your jurisdiction.

contactSupport.title: Contact support
contactSupport.content: For further help, email {email} or use the in-app chat.

q1.question: How do I update my specializations?
q1.answer: Go to Settings â†’ Specializations. If you need additional specializations added, contact support with your credentials.

q2.question: How are practitioners verified?
q2.answer: Practitioner documents are verified by our moderation team. Verification may take several business days.

q3.question: Can I cancel a booking?
q3.answer: Cancellations depend on the practitioner's policy. Check the consultation terms when booking and contact support for disputes.

topLawyers.heading: Top Lawyers in the Region
topLawyers.p1: Connect with expert legal professionals across the Middle East
